Judul: THE STUDY CHALLENGE THINKWEB AGENCY BUSINESS STRATEGY IN EMBRACING THE RAPID GROWTH OF SOCIAL MEDIA INDONESIA
Abstrak: The combination of affordble service and intenet device has encouraged IT literacy and boosted the number of social media users.  The rapid growth has also pushed the growth of digital undustry in Indonesia.  The resesrceh showed that the needs of strategyc and crative digital assistance nowdays are coming from various direction, such as companies, communication agencies and also personal clients. In thid case, there are new opportunities to be tapped, and new revenue streams can be developed. As one of the early player in the digital industry in Indonesia,  ThinkWeb must rspond to this and use the momentum to grow and establish the business to be bigger and better.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing : Dr.Ir. Mohammad Hamsal, MSE, MQM, MBA
Kata Kunci: model bisnis, business model, business strategy, digital strategy, social media strategy
